There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around June 14th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details my grandmother contacted mufon many years ago with her past abductions and sightings. she was even contacted personally by then. i will not get into all of that as it is a very long story. but after my grandmother and i had coincidentally had another (short conversation) about her experiences, i soon after went to go visit my boyfriend who lives in the city. it was late at night and i had looked out the window at an extremely purple sky with a large and strange cloud formation. i instinctively felt the need to take a picture. so i borrow my boyfriends camera. i was unable to see any lights at all in the sky at the time, not even planes, on account of the cloudiness. i set the camera function to 'night landscape'. i know night vision is actually most preferred, but sadly didn't\nor do i have it. but also very unfortunately, you don't get to see the very purple hue of the sky. still..after taking the picture, a formation of lights appeared at the top, nearly center of the picture and of the cloud formation. i'm not 100% on what it is, honestly. only picture it showed up in. i plan to try doing this with photo's in different places more often, so hopefully i will update soon!
Summary: Appeared in a picture after the clouds and sky looked odd & felt urge to take it. Didn't see anything without the camera.
